Sana Mouziane (a mụrụ n'afọ 1980) bụ onye Morocco na-eme ihe nkiri na onye na-agụ egwu.
Mgbe nne na nna ya gbara alụkwaghịm, ọ kwagara Marrakech
Mouziane kwagara London mgbe ọ dị afọ itoolu. Ọ gara nkuzi egwu wee kpebie isonyere otu egwu iji banye na asọmpi

Mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asaa, Mouziane kwupụtara abụ ihu ọha mbụ ya n'asụsụ Arabic na Darlington International Festival. O kwuru na ndụ ya n'England enyewo ya nguzozi n'etiti ọdịbendị ọdịda anyanwụ na agụmakwụkwọ ọwụwa anyanwụ nke na-enye ya ohere ibi ndụ ya n"ụzọ zuru ezu.
Mouziane wepụtara egwu izizi ya "Inta Lhoub" n'afọ 2004. Mouziane mere ihe nkiri izizi ya n'afọ 2005, na Women in Search of Freedom nke onye nduzi Egypt bụ Ines Al Dégheidi duziri
Ihe nkiri ahụ na-ekwu maka ụmụ nwanyị bi na mba ọzọ ma bụrụ ihe ịga nke ọma n'ụwa ndị Arab, na-emeri ọtụtụ ihe nrite na mmemme ihe nkiri

N'afọ sochirinụ, ọ pụtara na Ashra Haramy N'afọ 2007, Mouziane gosipụtara nwanyị na nwa nwanne di ya na-akwa iko na Samira's Garden. O meriri onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma maka ọrụ a na Panafrican Film and Television Festival nke Ouagadougou n'afọ 2009. N'afọ 2012, Mouziane mere Zahra, nwunye Sheikh, na ihe nkiri akụkọ ihe mere eme L'enfant cheikh nke Hamid Bennani duziri

Ọ kpọrọ ya ahụmịhe ọhụrụ, na-arụ ọrụ na ihe nkiri e debere n'oge ọchịchị ndị France. Ọ rụrụ ọrụ Martha, onye chọpụtara Jesu bilitere, n'afọ 2013 miniseries The Bible N'afọ 2017, Mouziane pụtara na La Nuit Ardente, nke Bennani duziri. O kwuru na ọ na-amasị ya ịrụ ọrụ obi ike.
Mouziane lụrụ onye injinia Britain bụ Alan Dearsley n'ụbọchị 14 ọnwa Febụwarị afọ 2013
Dịka o si kwuo, ọ bụ ịhụnanya na anya mbụ, ebe ọ nwere mmasị na ọdịbendị ya. Di na nwunye ahụ gara njem ezumike ha na Maldives. Ọ mụrụ nwa nwoke, Kenzi, n'afọ 2014 wee kwụsị ime ihe nkiri.
